title: Je t'aime, café noir
original_name: ジュテーム、カフェ・ノワール
sinopse:
Je T'aime Café Noir is a collection of bittersweet stories pretty much all revolving around the theme of love confession. Some are really melancholic and not very happy, but they are all permeated with sweet magic, of the kind that only Tomoko can weave.

(Source: MU)
